name: WeHOPE
description: Since its founding in 1999, WeHOPE is comprised of compassionate neighbors who are committed to providing access to clean water, nutritious food, and dignified, affordable housing for all who need it in the Santa Clara and San Mateo counties and throughout the Bay area, including San Francisco. WeHOPE's programs include mobile homeless services (such as Dignity on Wheels), emergency food and shelter, job training, and life skills development. Dignity on Wheels is not currently in SF County.

address: 1854 Bay Road, East Palo Alto, CA, 94303
